text: have you won today I'm making Boram cup
one of my favorite finger food snacks is
the great side dish to serve with beer
especially in the upcoming New Year
holiday let's begin for this recipe I'm
using 1 kilogram or 2 / 2 powers of Lib
shank is great if you can buy the whole
lot of muscle like this trim off the
silver skin on the outside then cut the
meat into you about 1 inch slices bring
a large saucepan of water to a boil then
add 1 piece of snap ginger one cinnamon
stick 1 star nice and a teaspoon of salt
these will enhance the flavor of the
meat then add the beef shanks and cook
on medium for about 15 minutes
occasionally steamed up the phone then
take them out and let whom you want to
cut about 2 to 3 lemongrass to the
length of a finger lightly proves with a

after the beef has cooled out cut into
cubes about one by two inches season the
meat with three tablespoons of minced
lemongrass two tablespoons of Ming
garlic a teaspoon of five-spice powder
and a teaspoon of turmeric powder all
these items will give the meat a really
nice color and also amazing aroma add a
few teaspoons of chili flakes or as much
as you can take a teaspoon of man Tom
Harmon Brooke for more intense flavor
you can replace with half a teaspoon of
salt also add two tablespoons of sugar
half a teaspoon pepper and four
tablespoons of soy sauce mix well and
also add the shredded lemon grass you
want to let the meat marinate for at
least eight hours or better 24 hours in
the fridge
the next day keep 3 tbsp of vegetable in
the lush walk as some lemongrass in
front you quite loaded then pour the
marinated beef cubes in and add more soy
sauce about 2 to 3 tablespoons if you
like a wet or stickier version you can
add some water and simmer for about 20
to 25 minutes on low heat stir
occasionally until the sauce dried out
the beef cubes we have time to observe
all the amazing flavors from the sauce
and become firm then sprinkle more
rhotacism ASIS and you will have a
religious neck if you prefer a dry
version after quickly stir-fry you can
spread the beef cubes out onto a baking
tray and bake in the oven 850 degree
celsius or 300 degrees Fahrenheit for
about 30 to 40 minutes rotating the
cubes up to every 15 minutes so they
will get bright evenly you can store the
beef cubes in a jar and put in the
fridge for a couple of weeks it's a
great drinking snack especially during
the tech holiday
